testCaseBlueprint.description: 5G EVE Multi-site Gaming use case composite_TCB_28_04_2021
testCaseBlueprint.name: 5G EVE Multi-site Gaming use case TCB_28_04_2021
testCaseBlueprint.resetConfigScript: EXECUTE_COMMAND vnf.a048c404-7277-4def-b9a8-7fb10bfbc5a2.extcp.mgmt0.ipaddress $$userA:$$passwordA sudo pkill -f node; EXECUTE_COMMAND vnf.5b8b2cbb-ea91-41e8-9b3a-daa00ae1a082.extcp.vprobe-cp0.ipaddress $$userB:$$passwordB sudo kill $(ps aux | grep './probe.bin' | awk '{print $2}'); EXECUTE_COMMAND vnf.53515cb1-8229-4b38-a533-4fd9d43e1c6a.extcp.cp_vce_mgmt.ipaddress $$userA:$$passwordA sudo pkill -f node; EXECUTE_COMMAND vnf.05a64cf4-6290-47be-8783-6c4d4f074f74.extcp.vprobe-cp0.ipaddress $$userB:$$passwordB sudo kill $(ps aux | grep './probe.bin' | awk '{print $2}');
testCaseBlueprint.executionScript: EXECUTE_COMMAND vnf.a048c404-7277-4def-b9a8-7fb10bfbc5a2.extcp.mgmt0.ipaddress $$userA:$$passwordA export FFMPEG_OUTPUTS=vnf.5b8b2cbb-ea91-41e8-9b3a-daa00ae1a082.extcp.vprobe-cp1.ipaddress:1234 UUID=$(sudo /usr/sbin/dmidecode | grep UUID | awk '{print $2}') & ./run.sh && sleep $$sleepTime; EXECUTE_COMMAND vnf.5b8b2cbb-ea91-41e8-9b3a-daa00ae1a082.extcp.vprobe-cp0.ipaddress $$userB:$$passwordB ./probe.bin -k __SPAIN_5TONIC 9092  -t $$metric.topic.Blockiness_es -t $$metric.topic.SpatialActivity_es -t $$metric.topic.BlockLoss_es -t  -t $$metric.topic.Blur_es -t $$metric.topic.TemporalActivity_es; EXECUTE_COMMAND vnf.53515cb1-8229-4b38-a533-4fd9d43e1c6a.extcp.cp_vce_mgmt.ipaddress $$userA:$$passwordA export FFMPEG_OUTPUTS=vnf.05a64cf4-6290-47be-8783-6c4d4f074f74.extcp.vprobe-cp1.ipaddress:1234 UUID=$(sh dmidecode.sh | grep UUID | awk '{print $2}') & ./run.sh && sleep $$sleepTime; EXECUTE_COMMAND vnf.05a64cf4-6290-47be-8783-6c4d4f074f74.extcp.vprobe-cp0.ipaddress $$userB:$$passwordB ./probe.bin -k __GREECE_ATHENS 9092 -t $$metric.topic.Blockiness_gr -t $$metric.topic.SpatialActivity_gr -t $$metric.topic.BlockLoss_gr -t $$metric.topic.Blur_gr -t $$metric.topic.TemporalActivity_gr;
